scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client" "npm run parsing" "npm run matching"
scripts.venv:parsing: cd parsing_service && python -m venv .venv && .venv\Scripts\python -m pip install --upgrade pip && .venv\Scripts\python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.venv:matching: cd matching_service && python -m venv .venv && .venv\Scripts\python -m pip install --upgrade pip && .venv\Scripts\python -m pip install --upgrade --force-reinstall -r requirements.txt
scripts.bootstrap:all: cd client && npm install && cd .. && npm run venv:parsing && npm run venv:matching
